Generation VI.X: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.
Generation VI.Y: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.

Generation VIII.Sword: The scent that constantly emits from its fur is so powerful that this Pokémon's companions will eventually lose their sense of smell.
Generation VIII.Shield: The scents Aromatisse can produce range from sweet smells that bolster allies to foul smells that sap an opponent's will to fight.
